div.p: ONE OF MY MEN HAS BEEN KILLED
I COULD DO WITH A NICE
LET ME KNOW, WE'LL BEAM UP.
WE GOT A JOB TO DO.
IN THE AREA OF THAT VILLAGE
AND THERE DOESN'T SEEM TO BE
NOT A CLOUD IN THE SKY.
I AM THE EYES OF VAAL.
THEN WE BURN UP FOR SURE.
I WISH TO SPEAK TO HIM.
DEEP IN THE EARTH BENEATH US.
WELL, WE CAN'T GET TO IT.
AND I CAN'T BEGIN TO TELL
TELL THE MEN OF VAAL TO
MEET ME IN THE CLEAR PLACE
IT IS THE WORD OF VAAL.
BUT IT IS A VIABLE ONE.
WE MEAN NO HARM TO YOU
